description.value:
You trample your foes as you charge past them.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Barreling Charge]{Barreling Charge} and successfully move through a creature's space, that creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier. If you critically succeed, the creature takes twice this amount of damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.
